name: Liquidzz
datadescription:
The sun is beating down and everybody is looking for ways to combat the heat. And, Liquidzzâ€¦ naturally fresh, the newly opened little outlet on Lake View Road is making merry with a menu card that lists more than 200 types of juices, shakes, smoothies and (for those who want it) hot beverages.

This application was primarily based out of web, then moved to mobile platforms, owing to the success of restaurant management point-of-sale application.

  • E-Commerce
  • Content Management System
